com.ensoftcorp.open.commons.analysis

Class StandardQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ensoftcorp.open.commons.analysis.StandardQueries

  • public final class StandardQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    Common queries which are useful for writing larger analysis programs, and for using on the shell.
    Author:
    Tom Deering, Ben Holland, Jon Mathews
